item.description:
DCR Hatch Memorial Shell, Charles River Esplanade, Boston

10:00 am - 5:00 p.m

Radio 92.9 EarthFestSaturday, May 19, 2012 - 10:00 am - 5:00 p.m
DCR Hatch Memorial ShellCharles River EsplanadeBoston

LOTS of Asian, Buddhist, international, vegetarian and vegan, and environmental groups will appear, and some if not much of the food available for free will be vegan.

Food not Bombs will be feeding again for a donation (a good feed for a $1-$2 donation).

Many eco-friendly groups will be there, also!

A celebration for the Earth showcasing environmentally friendly products, groups and activities, and featuring an all-star musical lineup and interactive family area. 

More information: http://www.myradio929.com/EarthFest.aspx

Maynard's GoogleVoice number is 617-615-9672 if you want someone to walk around with, but that's not likely to be necessary, once you arrive at the Esplanade and start looking around at all the exciting exhibits.
item.how_to_find_us: Oh - my - Get Maynard's GoogleVoice number and be prepared to give your name when you phone

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Radio 92.9 EarthFest (12:00 NOON -5:00 PM)
